svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - September 27 2020

title: "Week in Eth News
September 27, 2020" date: "2020-09-27"
Eth News and Links
Eth1
‚Ä¢ OpenEthereum release candidate for v3.1 . They have backtracked and will continue to support Kovan .
‚Ä¢ Snap sync in Geth benchmarking on Rinkeby
‚Ä¢ Turbogeth weekly alpha release . They‚Äôre moving to a modular architecture , with the first example
of using Turbogeth as a library
‚Ä¢ Tim Beiko‚Äôs eip1559 fee market with burn update : implementation, simulations, formal analysis,
community input
‚Ä¢ More eip1559 agent based simulations under various strategies in Jupyter notebook
‚Ä¢ Fuzzing the eip2537 BLS precompiles
EIPs/Standards
‚Ä¢ EIP2997 : IMPERSONATECALL opcode
‚Ä¢ EIP3005 : viability of batched meta transactions
Eth2
‚Ä¢ eth2 quick update : deposit contract live for Sept 29 dress rehearsal testnet launch. ‚Äú‚Ä¶everyone
involved is making their final preparations for [mainnet] launchüöÄ‚Äù
‚Ä¢ Prysm client update. Implementing weak subjectivity, planning for forks
Layer2
‚Ä¢ Optimism launches optimistic rollup testnet incentivized by Synthetix
‚Ä¢ DxDAO is deploying a payment network frontend to Loopring‚Äôs zkrollup
This newsletter is made possible thanks to Celer !
Celer is a coherent layer-2 scaling platform on Ethereum powered by Generalized State Channel Network
and Hybrid Rollup technology. Real money games, such as Arcade Win and Daub Cash , built using Celer's
gaming-focused SDK just reached top #10 ranking in App Store.We have also just launched State Guardian
Network beta testnet. Follow us on twitter , blog , discord and telegram .
Stuff for developers
‚Ä¢ How to set up Sentry and Pagerduty with Tenderly alerts for your Eth app
‚Ä¢ NestJS Truffle box
‚Ä¢ Create time-locked functions in Solidity with Builder
‚Ä¢ Dealing with ‚Äústack too deep‚Äù errors
‚Ä¢ First level of a game to learn Vyper
‚Ä¢ Several yearn vaults affected by bug this week
Frontrunning
‚Ä¢ A tale of Sam Sun, Scott Bigelow, Tina Zhen, SparkPool, and friends saving 10m in ETH from
frontrunners . More technical details of the bug from Lien
‚Ä¢ BlockNative releases a transaction pool explorer
‚Ä¢ ZenGo analyzes generalized frontrunning attacks
‚Ä¢ A closeup examination of Uniswap frontrunning bots in a large transaction
Enterprise
‚Ä¢ Visa‚Äôs Plaid is integrating with Dharma and Teller
‚Ä¢ HongKong central bank‚Äôs digitized international payments led by ConsenSys, whereas a prior version
had used Corda.
Application layer
‚Ä¢ DeFi passed 10 billion with Maker and Uniswap nearly tied for #1. (Though data got backfilled
putting TVL over 10b on Sept 12.)
‚Ä¢ ICL arXiv paper studying DeFi interest rates finds uncovered interest parity does not generally hold
‚Ä¢ Vocdoni‚Äôs voting as a service
‚Ä¢ Aave is about to pass a proposal to migrate LEND to AAVE
‚Ä¢ State of ENS 2020
Tokens/Business/Regulation
‚Ä¢ Proposed EU framework for cryptoasset regulation
‚Ä¢ OCC says banks/thrifts can hold stablecoins
‚Ä¢ SEC staff: security tokens can trade on exchanges
‚Ä¢ For the memecoiners: Liquality‚Äôs browser extension for cross-chain ETH/BTC swaps and tBtc launches
with increasing supply caps
‚Ä¢ Fairmint releases the SAFE-like Continuous Agreement for Equity (CAFE)
General
‚Ä¢ Kucoin hacked for at least 150m USD . Tether froze 33m USDT in response and Ocean Protocol paused
their token contract to migrate it
‚Ä¢ China state TV runs positive news about Ethereum and DeFi
‚Ä¢ Ex-employee of Loom Network opines on how the demise occurred
‚Ä¢ OpenBazaar to shut down if no funding found by 2021
‚Ä¢ ‚Äú websites secretly track you by drawing random junk offscreen and measuring small variations in how
different browsers/computers render it ‚Äù
Job Listings
‚Ä¢ DeFi devs! Yield is hiring for Solidity and front-end ‚Äì contact@yield.is
‚Ä¢ Mainframe is hiring a Senior Front End Engineer
‚Ä¢ Live for DeFi? mStable is looking for a Smart Contract/Protocol Developer
‚Ä¢ Integrate new blockchains into Chainlink as an Integrations Engineer
‚Ä¢ Trail of Bits hiring elite blockchain security engineers & app security
‚Ä¢ 0x is hiring devs! Full-stack, back-end, front-end or Solidity
‚Ä¢ Celer Network: hiring Solidity and Go devs. Email: hiring@celer.network
‚Ä¢ Nexus Mutual: experienced Solidity dev ; prefer European timezones
Want your job listing here ? $250 per line (~75 character limit including spaces), payable in ETH (or
250 DAI or 250 USDC) to evan.ethereum.eth. Questions? thecryptonewspodcast at-gmail
ü•© Staking pool questionnaire: October 15 ü•©
My questionnaire for staking pools will be due October 15th.
If you‚Äôre wondering ‚Äú why didn‚Äôt my post make it into Week in Ethereum News ,‚Äù then please put it on
an Ethereum subreddit; emails/DMs are not part of my workflow.
Please click the following if you‚Äôre interested in sponsoring the newsletter .
Follow me on twitter: @evan_van_ness

https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-september-27-2020/
Dates of Note
Upcoming¬†dates of note ( new/changes in bold ) :
‚Ä¢ Sep 29 - Spadina eth2 deposit contract/genesis dress rehearsal . viewing party
‚Ä¢ Sep 29 - ENS online workshop
‚Ä¢ Sep30 - Oct25 - EthPlanet hackathon
‚Ä¢ Oct 2-30 - EthOnline hackathon and summits
‚Ä¢ Oct 2 - Gitcoin grants matching ends . Here‚Äôs my Week in Eth News grant
‚Ä¢ Oct 19-26 - EthLagos energy hackathon
‚Ä¢ Oct 20 - submission deadline for Medalla data challenge
‚Ä¢ Oct 31 - submission deadline for Underhanded Solidity Contest
‚Ä¢ Nov 6-7 - virtual Trufflecon
‚Ä¢ Nov 16 - MetaMask Provider breaking changes
